user.title: Neovolt Solar Inverter
user.description:
Configure your Neovolt inverter Modbus TCP connection.

Make sure your Modbus gateway (e.g., EW11A) is:
- Connected to the same network as Home Assistant
- Configured in TCP Server mode
- Port 502 is open and accessible

data_description.host: IP address of your Modbus TCP gateway (e.g., 192.168.1.100)

error.cannot_connect:
Cannot connect to the inverter.

Error: {error}

Troubleshooting:
1. Verify the IP address is correct
2. Check that port 502 is accessible (firewall)
3. Ensure Modbus gateway is powered on
4. Verify gateway is in TCP Server mode
5. Test with: ping [IP] from Home Assistant terminal
error.unknown:
Unexpected error occurred: {error}

Please check Home Assistant logs for details.

abort.already_configured: This device is already configured. Check Devices & Services.
